university_core.legal_foundation: Presidential Decree No. (118) for the year 2013
university_core.institutional_mission: To build the student's productive personality as a productive research educational university adapted to the evolving needs of the 21st century labor markets. Promotes entrepreneurship, factory establishment, and the transfer of Chinese technical experience.

macro_leadership.president_background: 25 years experience in water resources management, sustainable development, environmental protection, WEF nexus. Senate of the Euro Mediterranean University (EMUNI). Consultant for FAO-UN. Manager of H2020, Erasmus+, Tempus EU projects.

physical_therapy.details: Licensed physical therapist (USA), Kinesiology Tape lecturer (South Korea), former Vice Dean at Cairo University.

pharmacy_and_drug_technology.details: External reviewer for NAQAAE, co-inventor of two patents.

international_requirements.general_mandate: Original Secondary School Certificate stamped by Egyptian Embassy or Ministry of Foreign Affairs
international_requirements.saudi_arabia_specific: Secondary Certificate plus General Abilities Test with username and password provided to Admissions
international_requirements.yemen_specific: Proof of 12 years of schooling stamped by school and certified by Educational Zone

financial_architecture_2023_2024_egp.payment_structure: Two installments: First installment is 60% of annual fees plus laboratory and administrative fees. Second installment is 40% of annual fees.

pedagogical_framework.credit_hour_definition: 1 credit hour = 1 hour lecture OR 2 hours tutorial OR 3 hours lab
pedagogical_framework.total_credit_hours_required: 180 hours under Legacy Plan, 145 hours under New Plan
pedagogical_framework.practical_load: Practice-oriented teaching strategy comprising approximately 50% practical/laboratory study load

dean_of_engineering_and_technology.name: Prof. Mohamed Talaat Moustafa
dean_of_engineering_and_technology.academic_history: B.Sc. (2000), M.Sc. (2005), and Ph.D. (2009) from Zagazig University. Ph.D. thesis on 'Electrical Trees in Solid Insulation Analysis'. Full Professor of Electrical Power Systems since July 2021.
dean_of_engineering_and_technology.global_recognition: Listed on Stanford University's World's Top 2% Scientists List for 2022 and 2023.
dean_of_engineering_and_technology.professional_experience: Former Head of Electrical Department at Shaqra University (KSA) securing 8-year ABET accreditation. Former IT Unit Manager and Consultant for Egyptian Ministry of Higher Education.
dean_of_engineering_and_technology.research_focus: Renewable energy integration, Artificial Intelligence applications in power systems, IoT, smart and microgrids monitoring.

vice_dean_graduate_studies_and_research.name: Prof. Nabil Hassan Mostafa
vice_dean_graduate_studies_and_research.academic_history: B.Sc. (1979), M.Sc. in Solar Energy (1982), Ph.D. in Mechanical Power Engineering (1988) from Mansoura University. Ph.D. thesis on cavitation phenomenon and erosion in centrifugal pump impellers.
vice_dean_graduate_studies_and_research.professional_experience: Former Dean of Engineering at Delta University. Former CIO at Zagazig University. Adviser for the Minister of Higher Education (2016-2018). Visiting Professor at Virginia Tech (USA).
vice_dean_graduate_studies_and_research.research_focus: Computational fluid dynamics (CFD), Mechatronics, Green Energy.

vice_dean_community_service_and_environm.name: Prof. Dr. Amr Ibrahim
vice_dean_community_service_and_environm.academic_history: B.Sc. (1998), M.Sc. (2003), Ph.D. in Electrical Power and Machines Engineering (2008) from Ain Shams University. Ph.D. thesis on 'Protection for Flexible AC Transmission Systems'.
vice_dean_community_service_and_environm.professional_experience: Former electrical engineer for ABB (Industrial Systems). Professor in Department of Electric Power and Machines.
vice_dean_community_service_and_environm.research_focus: Distributed generation, renewable energy, control engineering, power system optimization.
vice_dean_community_service_and_environm.publications: Over 40 papers and supervised over 10 Ph.D./M.Sc. theses.

academic_departments.pedagogical_focus: Computer engineering, software architecture, mobile and distributed computing, cybersecurity. Complies with NARS2018 standards. Prepares graduates as Developers, Technology Enablers, Researchers, and IT Managers. Emphasis on User Experience (UX) design and scalable systems.

Multidisciplinary integration of mechanical systems, electronics, and computer engineering. Specializations offered in Autotronics, Nanomechatronics, Industrial Mechatronics, and Bio-Mechatronics. Focus on automation, robotics, and autonomous systems.

leadership.head_of_department: Assoc. Prof. Mohamed Ismail Mohamed Ahmed

academic_departments.pedagogical_focus: Treats modern buildings as advanced technological systems. Focus on life cycle analysis, passive solar engineering, indoor air quality, building acoustics, envelope design, and earthquake resistance. Goal of engineering affordable housing solutions.

locations.library: on the first floor, next to the main entrance
locations.cafeteria: on the ground floor, at the end of the hall
